data.title: Zach Randolph, Basketball Player
data.meta_description: Zach Randolph stats and bio. Stats averages season by season. Quick access to game by game stats.
data.text:
Zach Randolph - Points

Zach Randolph scores a career high 43 points (2007)

On March 29, 2007, Zach Randolph set his career high in points in a NBA game. That day he scored 43 points in Portland's home loss against Memphis, 92-96. He also had 17 rebounds, 5 assists and 2 blocks. He shot 16/26 from two, shooting at 61.5% from the field. He also shot 11/16 from the free-throw line.

Zach Randolph - Rebounds

Zach Randolph grabs a career high 25 rebounds (2010)

On February 27, 2010, Zach Randolph set his career high in rebounds in a NBA game. That day he grabbed 25 rebounds in Memphis's road win against New York, 109-120. He also had 31 points, 2 assists, 2 steals and 1 block.

Zach Randolph - Assists

Zach Randolph gives a career high 10 assists (2016)

On March 19, 2016, Zach Randolph set his career high in assists in a NBA game. That day he dished 10 assists in Memphis's home win against LA Clippers, 113-102. He also had 28 points, 11 rebounds.

Zach Randolph - Steals

Zach Randolph has a career high 5 steals (2004)

On February 10, 2004, Zach Randolph set his career high in steals in a NBA game. That day he reached 5 steals in Portland's home loss against Utah, 81-86. He also had 16 points, 8 rebounds and 1 assist.

Zach Randolph - Blocks

Zach Randolph blocks a career high 5 shots (2004)

On November 23, 2004, Zach Randolph set his career high in blocks in a NBA game. That day he went for 5 blocks in Portland's road win against Miami, 87-99. He also had 24 points, 7 rebounds and 1 assist.
